snippet: Solazyme, a small California biotechnology company, and Bunge, a multinational agribusiness company, intend to build a factory in Brazil to produce oils from algae for use in biofuels and chemicals.
abstract: Solazyme, a small California biotechnology company, and Bunge, a multinational agribusiness company, intend to build a factory in Brazil to produce oils from algae for use in biofuels and chemicals.

headline.main: Solazyme and Bunge Plan Factory to Make Oil From Algae
